page.title: 19Recent History-St.Ippolyts 2
page.content: (contd from p.18) West Ipswich to Cardiff route.In 1978 it was made clear in the Government Atkin Inquiry that the route would join the M11 to the M1 via Stevenage A1M and Oxford crossing the A505 (Luton-Hitchin road). The first phase - Wymondley by-pass - is due to start in March 1986;the second phase is due to begin in 1990 - Ashbrook to Offley. The St.Ippolyts and Gosmore Preservation are trying to have this road diverted so as to avoid splitting St.Ippolyts and Gosmore in two. HOUSING: Several acres of formerly green belt land in London Road,St. Ippolyts were released (after much local protest) for building.Planning permission was given for up to 200 homes.This was in 1982.Building has not yet commenced.
